channel.title: PowerShell on Nebulika
channel.description: Recent content in PowerShell on Nebulika

item.title: Advanced O365 Administration Techniques
item.description:
This post focuses on some more advanced administrative tasks within Office 365. We will look at leveraging PowerShell scripts to automate user provisioning and license management, saving you valuable time.

PowerShell provides an incredible amount of control over your O365 environment, allowing for bulk operations and detailed reporting that aren’t available through the standard graphical interface.

This is a great follow-up to my previous post, where I discussed Getting Started with Intune.

item.title: PowerShell Automation Basics for IT Professionals
item.description: Learn the fundamentals of PowerShell automation to streamline your IT operations

item.title: Advanced PowerShell Scripting Techniques
